name: Pixer
description:
PIXER

A prototype made for Weekly Game Jam 127 - Theme 'Fix the Pixel'

Click on 'fixers' to left of the screen to swap ther positions and align them to the same color pixel.

Developed by Amalir Tate Emmanuel (Numster)

Music: Unknown Terrain from the Mega Music Collection pack by Muz Station Productions.

There is a .exe version here, but I advise you to play Pixer on an Android platform.
